import Mathlib

open Set

/-- Let U âŠ† â„^n be open and f : â„^n â†’ â„ differentiable on U.
    If f is convex on U then for all x,y âˆˆ U and t âˆˆ [0,1],
    f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y. -/

  âˆ€ x y, x âˆˆ U â†’ y âˆˆ U â†’ âˆ€ t âˆˆ Icc (0 : â„) 1, f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y :=
